name: Azura Gold Hotel & Apartment
address: 64/2 Tran Phu Street, Loc Tho Ward, Nha Trang, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm cách Bãi biển Nha Trang chưa đầy 100 m, Azura Gold Hotel & Apartment cung cấp phòng nghỉ nhìn ra biển. Chỗ nghỉ này có bàn đặt tour, lễ tân 24 giờ và WiFi miễn phí.

Trung tâm Thuyền buồm Việt Nam và Quảng trường chính đều nằm trong bán kính 200 m từ khách sạn. Sân bay Nha Trang cách đó 26 km.

Phòng nghỉ tại đây có TV truyền hình cáp, minibar và phòng tắm riêng với tiện nghi vòi sen cùng đồ vệ sinh cá nhân. Một số phòng được trang bị bồn tắm.

Du khách có thể được hỗ trợ với các dịch vụ giữ hành lý, giặt, ủi và cho thuê phương tiện đi lại. Dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay cũng được cung cấp.

review.comment_positive:
*Location
*Room decor
*Provided us with a waiting room until check in time..as we arrived with a sleeper bus
review.comment_negative:
*cleaner touched our personal stuff and took our bank card ...we approached reception and collected the card later during the day. Was super annoyed at this as I have no idea why one would take something that doesn't belong to them! Also I had advised reception that we didn't want anyone to enter our room...yet they still did. 
*Pool is so tiny...just two deckchairs and when windy the umbrella isn't safe. it nearly fell on us. 
*You have to choose breakfast the day before...can't understand why we couldn't decide on the day...

review.rating: Azura gold exceeded our expectations, would rate higher if I could.
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay at the Azura Gold Hotel. The location was great, as it was close to the beach, shops, restaurants and the night market. The pool was awesome to go and spend time, as well as the rooftop hangout spot. The best part of the whole stay was the staff, they were so welcoming, and kind. They let us store our bags while we explored Nha Trang. I highly recommend staying here, great value for money, and even got a free upgrade!

review.comment_positive: 가성비 최고의 호텔입니다! 저는 마지막날 새벽비행기라 공항가기 전 아기 재우려고 반일숙박했는데 뽕 뽑은 느낌이에요. 객실 스텝 분들이 너무너무 친절하셨고, 일단 여기 위치도 너무좋고(근처에 존맛탱 응온갤러리 랍스터뷔페도 있고 마사지거리도 가깝고 해변에 롯데마트에 암튼 좋은거 다있음) 객실 넓은데 2만원이라니 가격쩔고.. 더 못즐겨서 아쉬울정도!  스탭분들 진짜 모두모두 엄청 친절하셨어요.

The staff were the friendliest and most helpful people I could imagine. Made my stay all the more pleasant and easy. Can't thank them enough.
Helped with bookings and advice.

The location, the facilities, the staff are so good. We expected so much before going here as I read the very good comments about the hotel but still, I was stunned by the quality of it. I was lucky enough to have an ocean view room with spacious bed and plenty of places. the room was always cleaned properly by the staff, they were super nice and always ready for help, they always checked if we have enough tea, coffee, water or towels or anything in the room even we did not ask for it. I want to say a special thank to Sang in the reception for helping us with carrying the luggages and welcomed us with the smiles and some person in the reception was helpful with exchanging the cash for my mum.

review.rating: You will get the  money value  out of this hotel. Try it. It is definitely worth it.
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 3 nights before the trip to Dalat and 5 nights after Dalat trip. The staff member Ms Ha was extremely helpful and very nice.  She made it sure we stayed in the same room during the whole stay. We had a lot of questions and she answered all the  questions and took her time to give us all the information we needed.  Thank you Ms Ha!  In general all the staff members were very friendly and ready to help us at anytime.  Especially one of the receptionist, her name was 'Sun' was very efficient and always smiling. She was  such a nice lady.  She got the best driver for us to take us to the airport  at very reasonable price. The car was much more spacious and comfortable than we expected. Thank you Ms. Sun!
We are really satisfied with Azura Gold Hotel and have a good memory. We highly recommend this hotel who travels to Nha Trang.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
I extended my stay for like 4 or 5 times, all because of this hotel. Everything was beyond my expectations. I stayed in Ho Chi Minh City before coming to Nha Trang, the experience in Ho Chi Minh City taught me not expecting too much.. However Azura Gold Hotel totally blowed my mind. Yes, it is a proper hotel, staffs are friendly and willing to help. They care about you. 
I stayed in almost all the room types, there is none of them disappointed me. 
I loved staying in my room like living in here, I enjoyed staying on rooftop to feel the breeze, I liked their cozy gym/training space and the massage chair. 
Beach is just across the street. You can feel the ocean’s breath if you let the balcony door open. 
Come and feel it, you will never disappoint.

With the pool just at the top a lot of noise with kids but that was ok as we don’t mind kids.  Only thing is when people are wet they leave wet patches on the floor or in the lift, it becomes slippery.

review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Cost performance definitely comes first, then conveniency and friendly service. It is 2-3 minutes walk to the beach, I enjoyed every sunrise and sunset during my stay. There are many shops and restaurants in 15 minutes of walking distance area. The hotel is in a small alley, so it is quiet enough for light sleepers like me. I can’t imagine staying in the hotels on main street because the honking sound can be very annoying, but in here I didn’t have any sound problems. Stuffs are friendly and willing to help at anytime. Breakfast was very authentic and tasty. Room is spacious with ocean view. Balcony is not that big but good enough to stay out a little to enjoy the view, also if you want to enjoy the parramatta view, there is rooftop terrace. Swimming pool is compact but definitely enough to feel of water or read some books on beach chair. In overall, I’d definitely recommend Azura Gold Hotel to whoever visit Nha Trang city.

We had a pleasant stay there. We checked in very late in the night and it was no problem. We used the gym and the swimming pool, both very nice. 
The breakfast was very good, upon request they even prepared special meals according to our dietary needs and changed it every day. 
The vegan soup of the first day was soooo delicious. The room was clean and spacious, a/c and fan were silent and worked perfectly. The shower too. Laundry service worked smoothly. Would recommend!

review.rating: Veldig bra hotell! Kan anbefales alle!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Stort rom! Bestilte 3-mannsrom og hadde plass til at alles kofferter kunne ligge åpne på gulvet. Behagelig størrelse på badet og vannkoker og kjøleskap på rommet.

Dusjen hadde godt trykk og varmt vann!

Fikk gratis vann, og hotellansatte var veldig hjelpsomme når vi ville spise instant nudler nede i hotellrestauranten fremfor å gå ut på resturant en sen kveld. 

Fantastisk utsikt fra rommet vårt!

Frokosten er fantastisk! <3
review.comment_negative:
Det var noen flekker på sengesettet, men det virket nyvasket. De redde opp senga, men byttet ikke sengetøy hver dag.

Vi fikk et tomannsrom siste dagen da vi måtte bestille en dag ekstra. Utsikten var kjedelig og rommet veldig lite, men det funket.

review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay at Azura Gold! We got a last minute deal so we paid a very reasonable price for a lovely room. we got a complimentary upgrade on arrival too which was great. the room was spotless and very comfortable. the staff could not have been more accommodating and helpful throughout! the hotel had a lovely, peaceful rooftop pool and a small gym both overlooking the beach. the location was ideal. we were able to book our onward travel through reception too and honestly it was the most comfortable bus journey we have had yet in Vietnam. would highly recommend staying here!

review.rating: Nice hotel at a good location :)
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Great location and very friendly staff! We just stayed one night and would come again. Beach and restaurants are in close proximity without having all the noise as it‘s not straight at the street but a bit behind. Breakfast was good, you have to order the night before but that seems to be pretty normal in Vietnam.

Staff were incredibly helpful and accommodating. They arranged early breakfast for us on two mornings so we could eat before our 7am dive trip. On the day we departed our train wasn’t until 7pm. We left the bags in the hotel after checkout and when we picked them up we had a shower which was great!

Wonderful facilities, location, and staff. Just on the beach, but also hidden from hustle and bustle with a laneway entrance (so minimal noise from street). We had an amazing room and were impressed with the beach views from rooftop pool and lounge. Great service from staff, particularly Kevin at front desk. He was very helpful in providing recommendations for food and very attentive generally.

Super helpful staff, comfy room with excellent aircon, roof pool and seating area, ideal location down a short alley with part views over the pretty seafront (room 806).
Restaurants and convenience shops close by. Excellent for £10 a night.

Special shout-out to the to receptionists Adam and Andy. They were both always very kind and helpful.

review.rating: J'ai été très déçue de mon séjour à Nha Trang, ville bruyante et sans âme.
review.comment_positive:
L'emplacement est bien pour certaines raisons par exemple il est proche de petits magasins de fruits, ban mi et petit marché, ainsi que de nombreux restaurants.
Par contre c'est très très très bruyant.... Nha Trang est une ville dans laquelle le tourisme de masse s'est développé de manière anarchique.
La seule chose que j'ai beaucoup apprécié est le spectacle de Life Puppets au Do théâtre. C'était superbe, le spectacle et le théâtre

오션뷰 트윈으로 3박 묵었습니다. 해당 룸에선 모든것이 좋았습니다.
청결도, 와이파이, 뷰, 소음 등 불편한 것이 하나도 없었습니다.
마지막날 동일 룸 레이트 체크아웃이 되지 않아 다른 방으로 이동하여 연장해준 부분도 서비스 세심함에 만족하였습니다.

review.comment_positive: Hotel był w bardzo dobrej lokalizacji. Pokój urządzony standardowo, czysty. Widok z okna na morze. Śniadanie najlepsze jakie jadłam w Wietnamie, wegańska zupa. Okazało się, że na dachu jest niewielki basen oraz siłownia.
review.comment_negative: Właściwie to nie mam większych zastrzeżeń. Pokój nie był zbyt duży. Było tam coś na wzór balkonu, ale mieściła się tam jedna osoba na stojąco. Można było tam powiesić ciuchy np.

review.rating: Lovely seafront hotel w/ fast WiFi & super friendly staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Staff was so, so nice — always smiling, and they helped us with booking our bus to Danang, gave us a recommendation for scuba diving (was really good!!), told us where to go for good local food, and even gave us a room upgrade. 

WiFi was fast (60mbit), perfect for video conferences. 

It’s a brand new hotel with comfortable beds and a shower that doesn’t run out of hot water :) Lots of natural light in the room (with blackout curtains for when we wanted to sleep in) & a great view of the sunrise over the ocean.
review.comment_negative: The pool was under maintenance, so sadly we couldn’t use it. However, it looks like it will be reopened soon :)

review.comment_positive: We really liked the Azura Gold Hotel! The rooms are very comfortable and very clean. The beds and the shower are great. The location of the hotel is very good, in a maximum of 5 minutes walk you are on the beautiful beach and there are many stores and restaurants nearby. The hotel staff are very friendly and courteous. Andy gave us a very nice welcome and looked after us very well. We were very grateful that we were able to check out in the middle of the night. We can highly recommend a stay at the Azura Gold.
가성비 최고입니다. 새벽 늦게 도착했는데도 직원분이 기다랴주셔서 고맙고 미안했어요~ 저렴한가격이지만 수영장, 오션뷰, GYM 다 갖추고 있습니다. 위치도 시내 중심가라 다니기 좋아요

review.comment_positive: Đây là một trong những khách sạn mà nhất định mình sẽ đến khi đi Nha Trang. Anh Chị nhân viên siêu dễ thương làm mình cảm giác rất thoải mái, gần gũi như người nhà. Không phải khi không mà khách sạn đạt 9,8/10 đâu. Rất ưng ý.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
진짜 맘에 안 드는 점 하나 없이 너무 좋았던 호텔!!!
좋은 점 하나 하나 꼽아보자면..
- 객실 : 깨끗한건 물론, 필요한 것들이 모두 구비되어 있었고 에어컨도 빵빵했다! 바다전망 룸으로 예약 했는데 이 가격에 이런 뷰가 나올 수 있나 싶었고 작은 발코니까지 딸려있어서 답답하지도 않았다.
- 직원분들 : 모든 직원분들이 너무나도 친절하셨다.
특히 Ms Minh Ha 님은 체크인부터 투어, 머드스파, 슬리핑버스 예약까지 전부 실시간으로 친히 도와주셨다, 정말 감사드려요 :D
- 위치 : 호텔로 들어가는 작고 짧은 골목을 나와 길만 건너면 바로 냐짱비치어서 아침에 일어나자마자 일출 보면서 바다에서 수영한 기억이 너무 좋다. 근처에 아보카도 아이스크림 맛집도 있어서 수영 끝나고 먹으면 천국이었다..

We booked a Junior Suite but were disappointed to find that it had virtually no storage space for clothing. There was a shelf with a few coat hangers below and a couple of tables to pile things on but no wardrobe, drawers or anything that you would consider 'normal' furnishings for a hotel room. While it had a 'balcony', it was about the size of a shower cubicle.

The breakfast consisted of 4 choices, and you had to specify what you wanted the night before. My wife and I tried three of the options between us (Vietnamese beef & noodle soup, fried eggs and bread, and bread and jam) all of which were, to be generous, very disappointing. Breakfast came with a cup of tea or coffee but they wanted to charge extra if you wanted fruit juice. We ended up ignoring the breakfast and ate elsewhere.

review.rating: 10/10 amazing stay with hospitable staff and the perfect, quiet location.
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
We were so glad to have found such an amazing place for such a bargain. Cheap but the rooms were new, very clean and situated at the perfect location - close to everything, facing the ocean and quiet. 

We arrived at 5am via overnight train and check in isn’t until 2pm, but the staff (and owner?) were very happy for us to leave our bags at reception until check in. We didn’t mention anything when we dropped our bags off, but the owner must have sensed that we wanted to check in early, so he got the room tidied and ready for us in a few hours, and allowed us to check in a few hours earlier than planned, without extra charge! We were pleasantly surprised and genuinely so grateful, as we haven’t showered for 1.5 days and felt immensely icky. 

The hotel itself is walking distance to town centre, and our bedroom faces the ocean, so it was nice waking up to that beautiful view. 
Also loved the circular bed! 

The staff are also very quick to give recommendation on things to do and restaurant to eat at when asked. 

Upon check out, they once again let us leave our bags and even lent us towels so we can go on our snorkelling tour! 

In the end, the room, the service and the hospitality is worth 5+ stars, yet we paid so little for our stay. Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone!! We will definitely stay here again in the future if we visit Nha Trang again.

review.comment_positive:
The location is right opposite the beach, next to the main city, so it's quite happening at night. The mart is just down the street, attractions are not far from the hotel, walkable and taxis are everywhere. Grab food saves my savings too. 

Second plus point, I can watch the sunrise and sunset just from my room window, the little gym and roof top lounge. It was all simple but everything you need. 

Lastly but also the most important ones, all staff are friendly and there to help.

review.rating: nhiệt tình , chu đáo , sạch sẽ

review.comment_positive:
Очень приятный персонал, который хорошо знает английский. Оказалось, что забронировал маленький номер(не видел размеров, когда бронировал), персонал сразу же улучшил номер по своей инициативе без каких либо доплат. 
Есть бассейн, терраса и массажное кресло на 10м этаже.(но не все так хорошо). Близко до моря.
review.comment_negative: Там есть прям очень плохие номера, и именно его я умудрился забронировать. Там окно 30x40см на улицу и обычное окно в общий коридор! Не знаю кто этот гений архитектор, но это не единственный такой номер. После того как нам бесплатно улучшили номер в новом оказался балкон на море!(но есть нюансы) Этот балкон 0,5 метра шириной и утоплен в здание на 3-4 метра, т.е. как будто свет в конце тунеля видишь! И это единственный естественный свет в номере! При этом вода в душе практически не уходит и после помывки двух человек вода уже чуть ли не в комнату выливается. Сказали об этом персоналу - сказали разберутся, но разобрались только через 2 дня(хотя кажется, что вантуз не очень сложное изобретение). После жалоб на этот номер предложили сначала улучшить номер на 3х местный на 2м этаже с доплатой в треть стоимости бронирования - мы отказались, хотя готовы были доплатить, если бы был вид на море. После еще 3х дней номер улучшили бесплатно на тот же, что раньше предлагали с доплатой. Но перестали убираться в номере и воду давать тоже перестали. Без понятия в чем проблема была, мы уезжали на экскурсии, а номер оставался грязный. Это точно не 4 звезды. При этом в новом номере вода в душе тоже не уходила. Но жаловаться уже не было сил. Здание всего 10 этажей, утоплено в глубь застроек,  с видом  на море там очень мало номеров. Фотки ввели в заблуждение, что это высотка. То же самое с бассейном на верху. Он как бы есть, но за ним плохо смотрят, много мусора плавает, волосы, за 11 дней так и не решились там искупаться. Массажное кресло - не работает половина режимов. На террасе только 4 места с видом на море. Я бы советовал выбрать другой отель, ни звездность, ни рейтинг не отражают реальность.

review.comment_positive: Unfortunately, We were robbed on the beach on our second day in Nha Trang. Our wallets, Watch and iPhone were all stolen. We went to the hotel to see if they could help us and when the owner of the hotel heard, he came to meet us. He took us to the police station and sat with us for 3 hours and acted as a translator. He made sure we were okay and even offered to post us the police report. A true gentleman who went out of his way to help us during a very difficult situation and asked for nothing in return. A lovely hotel with a great owner and kind staff.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình

Everything. Room, bed, pool and especially the staff. We were treated like royalty. Incredibly helpful staff with info, booking excursions or booking future travel. Would highly recommend and would 100% return. You’re also on the beach front which is a huge bonus.

review.comment_positive: Я отдыхала в этом отеле вместе с сыном. Понравилось все! Очень услужливый персонал, ребята на ресепшен откликались на любую просьбу. Отличное соотношение цены и качества. Номера чистые, очень комфортабельные кровати. Удачное месторасположение отеля: первая линия, но в то же время вход в отель через маленький переулок, это создает тишину. Рядом супермаркет, пляж через дорогу, которую мы научились переходить без нервов, пешеходный переход рядом с отелем. Вкусный завтрак, который можно заказать по желанию. На ресепшен выдают пляжные полотенца. Кондиционеры работают тихо и вообще тишина была в отеле. Судя по фото, на крыше есть бассейн, но мы так и не дошли до него. Зачем? Ведь рядом такое прекрасное море! Всем советую выбирать этот отель! Ребятам на ресепшен огромное СПАСИБО!
review.comment_negative: При ежедневной уборке ложили только один маленький кусочек мыла. Это мало для двоих человек. Необходимо класть 2 кусочка мыла!

Veldig flott, ryddig og rent hotel. Jeg likte de vennlige og imøtekommende ansatte som gjorde alt for vår trivsel. Vi kunne spørre de om alt og de hadde gode tips. Vi hadde et veldig komfortabelt opphold her.
Frokosten bestilles kvelden før og var veldig bra selv om det ikke var buffé. 
Vi fikk oppgradert rom uten tillegg og hadde en liten veranda og flott utsikt over strandpromenaden. God plass på rommet med gode senger.

review.comment_positive: Great and convenient location with a great view of the beach and surrounding islands. Free massage chair on the 9th floor near the pool area. Roof top pool was smallish but very nice, also with a great view. The staff were endlessly helpful and were happy to modify breakfast to my liking. Room was immaculate. It’s the only hotel Ive stayed in all of Vietnam that didn’t have a rock hard bed. Quite the opposite. Wonderful and soft mattress with lovely soft sheets and pillows. I didn’t want to leave.

review.comment_positive:
I was greeted warmly by all the staffs (Mr Tung and Ms Sun) since the first time I arrived. The owner seems also a nice person.

The cleanliness of this hotel is superb.

For the rate I paid, I get much more in return. Beautiful view to the beach, complete amenities... I can go on with more compliments.

They even let me use the storage after checkout and shower before my overnight bus.

Definetely will comeback if I visit Nha Trang.

Thanks for all the team to provide affordable room without compromising the quality:) Good job and good luck to you guys.

Các bạn lễ tân đều rất chu đáo nhiệt tình, đặc biệt em lễ tân tên Nhật đã hỗ trợ mình rất nhiều trong thời gian ở tại khách sạn, từ hướng dẫn chọn tour cho tới đặt xe đưa đón, thuê xe máy...vv
review.comment_negative: Khách sạn có bể bơi tại tầng 10 nhưng kích thước hơi nhỏ.

review.rating: Excellent room, staff and everything else!
review.comment_positive: The room was beautiful and comfortable. Everything here was top notch! Definitely the best place i stayed during my entire month in Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển

review.comment_positive:
The staff is super friendly and helpful - I arrived very early in the morning and they managed to find a room for me. 

The location is very good, you’re mestres away from watching the sunrise or sunset on the beach. There are plenty of markets around so is very handy. 

The hotel has a small gym which is very handy and the pool is a nice place to chill as well. There’s a common area you can read a book or do some yoga as well. 

Overall, very good cost benefit
review.comment_negative: The gym could have AC since it gets a lot of sun from early morning.

review.rating: So far, the best stay in Vietnam
review.comment_positive:
Everything was great. Really good value for money. People working there were amazing too.
What I would put forward is the laundry service. It was the best one I ever experienced in terms of how nicely smelled the clothes and how nicely it was folded, and bundled together.

review.comment_negative: Staff were friendly but service could be far better - levels of english were very basic.  We had a large group and hence there were some issues thoughout for some of the group

review.comment_positive: We had a very lovely stay in Nha Trang thanks to our hotel, Azura Gold Hotel. It is perfectly located near the beach and all touristic attractions. The room was big and clean and especially the receptionists were very friendly and welcoming. They organized everything for us to have a great stay. They even organized night/sleeping bus tickets for us to go to our next destination. We would absolutely recommend staying in that hotel.

review.rating: We had a good time in Nha Trang and could enjoy the ocean, the hotel the foods and the massage.
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is perfectly located in central of nha trang and for one minute you are at the beach. Everything like diversified foods or spa/ massage/ hair wash or bars/ disco, night markets are around the hotel.
The staff is really nice, as I can always image how the people in this area are and are very supportive if you need them.
Breakfast are good and it’s not a buffet. Since I’m from the north of Vietnam I didn’t try everything but I really like bún bò Huế. 
Our room is big and with a lot of windows to the sea view. The room is quite clean and bed is good enough to sleep.
review.comment_negative:
Well, it is understandable that all extra services are charged more as usual.so if you have time and can look around, no need to make laundry or rent motorbike at the hotel cause they are more expensive. But for sure more convenient.
By the way, due to its central location it might be very loud and noisy.

The room was lovely, clean and modern. The on-site pool is great, it is small with only space for 2 sunbeds but it was great when you had the space to yourself.

The staff can organise a scooter for you and onward transport if you would like. We got a bus to Da Lat which ended up being very late but the staff were apologetic and gave us loads of free water to apologise.

The place is right on the beach with loads of nearby restaurants.

The gym is hilarious with loads of very random images on the walls!

Das hätte man nicht stark gehört wenn sich das Fenster im Bad hätte schliessen lassen. Die Lage ist dafür unübertrefflich, 3 Min. Zur Beach oder zur sehr lebhaften und doch kleinen Stadt.

review.comment_positive:
Прекрасное расположение, рядом крупные ТЦ, рядом с отелем маленький магазин, где есть все необходимое
На крыше есть бассейн
В номере убирались ежедневно, всегда ставили бутылочки с водой, wifi работает стабильно, персонал очень приветливый, всегда был готов помочь
Запросил поздний выезд, но к сожалению предоставить не смогли. Чемодан оставил в специальной комнате. Уже после 12:00 сообщил, что хотел бы принять душ, дали ключ от свободной комнаты и разрешили спокойно помыться. 
Завтрак заранее не брал, заказывал на месте. Стоит 60к донгов, выбор небольшой, но все блюда понравились.
review.comment_negative:
При заселении у меня не было достаточного количества денег, чтобы оплатить бронь. Попросили оставить паспорт в залог. На следующий день разменял деньги, оплатил номер, паспорт вернули. 
При этом завтраки без проблем записывали на номер, их оплатил при выселении

review.rating: 芽庄之旅住宿不错体验❤️
review.comment_positive:
最满意的就是
酒店地点方便。
房间干净。
无异味。
一切设备都完整。
还有小露台（大概2个大人可以站立的空间）
步行2分钟有24小时杂货店。
步行5分钟可以抵达沙滩。
步行5-10分钟酒店附近很多小食摊与饭馆。

晚上还是可以听到热情旅游客在沙滩的笑声与交通工具喇叭声（越南特色）
不错体验🤣

还有本地景点也是很靠近❤️

工作人员非常有礼貌和满满的帮忙。
语言方面英文交流可以。

无论是风景地点或本地美食。
他们可以介绍。

如果要机场接驳车。
可以联络酒店。
方便快速。

酒店顶楼还有健身房，聊天区与小泳池。
顶楼取景拍照一流。

酒店价钱便宜，适合背包旅客和一家大小.

下一次还要再来住宿❤️
review.comment_negative:
芽庄夏天实在太热。
冷气有一点点不给力。
不过还可以接受

review.comment_positive: Highly recommend! Location is perfect, clean rooms, very comfortable, housekeeping every days, the staff friendly. We arrived at 4 am and they let us stay in “waiting room” that was, actually, a room with bed and shower, very nice to rest after a long journey to Nha Trang and wait to the check in !
Located near the beach. Nice and clean rooms . The hotel receptionist Ha was really friendly and helpful. They make you feel really comfortable.

Les rideaux pourraient être plus occultants, mais ça allait quand même !

Hotellet ligger mycket nära stranden men ändå 50 meter in från stora vägen som går längs kusten. Detta gör att man inte blir störd av ljud från trafiken.
Ute på stora vägen har du mycket stort utbud av frukt, supermarket och framförallt matställen.
Frukosten som du väljer från menu dagen innan har ganska många olika val och är lagom i storlek.
Finns en härlig massage fåtölj på takterrassen under poolen. Hotellet är prisvärt och kan rekommenderas.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Location is good, 2 min walking distance to the beach. Friendly and helpful staff made our stay enjoyable. Sun from reception gave us a free upgrade to a higher floor where we had a view of the sea! Wi-Fi works perfectly. The rooms are new and clean. Shower is lovely. Sun gave us some nice addresses where we could eat. She also helped us with booking bus tickets. She is very involved and takes good care of you, even allowed to shower after check out because our bus trip was late in the evening. Even the day after we left she sent us a message if we arrived well and how the bus trip was ❤️

We had a nice meeting with the owner of the hotel Mr. Dang Ving Hien, he even came to say goodbye to us and got sandwiches for the road 🤩
We enjoyed staying at this hotel and highly recommend it. You won't regret it!

Greetings from Pınar & Barış

In der Beschreibung des Hotels als Dachterrasse definiert ist lediglich ein kleiner Austritt von 50 x 50 cm. 
Frühstück muss immer einen Tag vorbestellt werden, sehr begrenzte Auswahl. Uns wurde zumindest noch ein Obstteller zusätzlich zugestanden. Das Hotel wurde mit einem Fitnessstudio beworben. Das ist ein schlechter Witz, dort standen ein altersschwaches Laufband, ein Fahrrad Trainer und drei Hanteln !!! 
Unserer Meinung nach sind das keine vier Sterne wert.

review.rating: Minutes from the beach, immaculate room, great shower.

review.comment_positive: Minutes from the beach, extremely clean, cool massage chair in the gym, very clean rooftop pool. Initially I was charged double for my laundry but when they realised their mistake they sent someone to meet me at the bus station (20min away) to refund me. I really appreciated the effort they went to to correct their mistake. Very honest.
review.comment_negative: A bit more equipment in the gym

review.rating: Very good price for a simple stay close to the beach but no more
review.comment_positive: Though hidden in an alley, the hotel was located right across the beach. Staff was very welcoming and polite. We stayed in a spacious room and the price was very cheap. After a visit to the beach, you could wash your feet right in front of the hotel.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast was a limited selection of one small meal and one drink. They had no vegetarian or vegan option. You had to order the day before. I requested certain dietary options but they were forgotten. The breakfast area was also very hot with a fan that didn't reach all tables and no AC. The room was quite dated. You could easily tell. Our door handle and lock was almost broken from the door. The "gym" consisted of a treadmill, cycler and four dumbbells in a room with no fan or AC. They had no designated chairs at the beach. They do offer beach towels at the hotel but not enough for us to get them.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Great location with just a street away from the beach. Located in an alley but taxis could access easily. Spacious room with firm and very comfortable beds and plenty of storage. Cute bathroom. My room was on level 7 thus great view of ocean from big windows. Sunrise was a magnificent view. Curtains blocked out the sunlight well if we needed a nap. Service was efficient, very friendly and easygoing. The pool on level 10 was small but clean and has great view. There was a gym on level 9 with a treadmill, some weights, exercise bike and a massage chair. I can't fault the stay!
review.comment_negative: None. But a handrail on the stairs connecting the pool level with the lift level would make it 100% perfect.

review.rating: Uma fantástica estadia, perto da praia e funcionários muito simpáticos!
review.comment_positive: A simpatia dos funcionários foi um dos pontos altos da nossa estadia, principalmente na preocupação constante sobre estarmos ou não a gostar da nossa experiência em Nha Trang! A localização do Hotel é extraordinária, visto que, em menos de 2 minutos a pé estamos na praia e a cerca de 10 minutos do centro mais movimentado... o suficiente para conseguirmos descansar de noite!
review.comment_negative: Julgo que a oferta do pequeno-almoço pudesse ser mais diversificada e em regime de Buffet... estava tudo excelente, mas tivémos de comer o mesmo todos os dias da nossa estadia. Em relação ao Transfer do Aeroporto para o Hotel, espero que melhorem o serviço de motoristas que possuem como parceiros, dado ter sido uma experiência enjoativamente negativa.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển

review.comment_negative: Acesso para o hotel não é "luxuoso", tendo de se atravessar uma rua estreita e escura.

review.comment_positive:
아침일찍 나트랑 도착이라 아침일찍 체크인 할 수 있는지 미리 문의했는데, 기꺼이 그렇게 할 수 있도록 도와주었습니다. 호텔에 도착해서도 직원들은 아주 친절했으며, 모든 필요사항에 대해 기꺼이 도와주었습니다. 정말 친절했습니다.
코로나 이후 재오픈했다고 하는데, 시설은 굉장히 깔끔했고 방 상태는 굉장히 청결했습니다. 방에는 필요한 것은 모두 구비되어 있었으며, 바다전망도 좋았습니다. 심지어 숙박요금은 굉장히 저렴합니다. 다음에 나트랑에 온다면 분명 이곳에서 머물것입니다.
새벽에 깜란 공항으로 가야한다면, 호텔에서 33만동에 택시를 예약할 수 있습니다.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển

review.comment_positive: This property is situated up a small alley off of the main beach promenade, so it is away from all the traffic noise. Restaurants / cafes within easy walking distance. Good communication before we arrived. Warm, enthusiastic welcome from the 2 bods on the reception desk. Very helpful and professional throughout our stay. Upgraded us to a larger room with a sea view on arrival. Spotlessly clean. Impressive power shower. Exuberant aircon. Comfy bed. Laundry done overnight at a very reasonable rate. Small swimming pool on the roof + gym with very good views of the entire bay. Service generally was up to 5 star big hotel standard. Amazing value for money. Can't think why you would bother to stay anywhere else in Nha Trang. Highly recommended

review.comment_negative: A buffet breakfast would have been preferable. Other than that, there was nothing we didn't like and we would stay there again if a similar room was available.

review.comment_positive: Vị trí trung tâm, phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên phục vụ tốt.

Приятный чистый отель, в самом центре! Очень хороший персонал, помогали во всех вопросах, по нашей просьбе принесли рабочий стол в номер, номер был с видом на море. Очень чистый! Вкусно пахли полотенца)) 

Арендовали байк прям в отеле, что тоже очень удобно)
review.comment_negative: Однообразные завтраки, кроме как яиц с вкусным хлебом и супа на завтрак, выбирать было нечего))

review.comment_positive:
Het personeel was echt super vriendelijk. Met name Sun heeft ons met van alles geholpen en zij sprak goed engels (zoals het spontaan boeken van een mud bath omdat het regende en ze regelde bustickets en vervoer) Haar collega's waren ook erg vriendelijk. We kregen trouwens een free upgrade naar kamer met zeezicht en balkon.
Na het uitchecken konden we de hele dag nog onze spullen in het hotel laten en zelfs nog douchen na onze stranddag, voordat we de nachtbus in gingen.

Locatie is goed, aan de overkant van de weg ligt de zee met veel keuze aan strandbedden.

Kamer was netjes en de bedden lagen erg lekker, beetje zacht en met goede ondersteuning.

Veel kwaliteit - lage prijs

Khi cần Azura có
Khi khó có Azura

Todo! este lugar totalmente lo recomendaría para parejas o familias que busquen limpieza , servicio y comodidad. estuvimos en el cuarto con vista al mar y era hermoso! 
las instalaciones son nuevas y los cuartos muy limpios pero sin embargo lo que se llevó todo fue el servicio de las chicas Ha y Sun que siempre súper atentas nos preguntaban si necesitábamos ayuda en el día a día. 
resécanos por una noche y terminamos reservando por cuatro noches ya que los sentíamos muy muy muy a gusto! 
y el precio … bueno ya lo verán después ! buenísimo, barato y le pongo un 10

review.comment_positive:
Приехал из аэропорта часа в 23, на ресепшен меня любезно встретили и сразу разместили. Очень  дружелюбный персонал, разговаривающий на английском языке. Номер комфортный, по соотношению цены и качества просто замечательный. Отель расположен на первой линии, но не прямо у дороги, а чуть в глубине, из окна 3-го этажа уже было видно море, а это оказалось как плюс так и минус.
Бронировал номер без завтраков, но покупал два раза вкусный и сытный завтрак. Уборка предлагалась всегда и когда я сказал что ее нужно сделать, то уборку сделали во время моего отсутствия. В номере было чисто, две бутылочки воды каждый день, чайник, чай, кофе.
review.comment_negative: Классно видеть море из окна, но первая линия имеет и недостатки: громкая музыка из соседних заведений в будни до 23 часов, в субботу где то до 1 часа ночи, а в 5.30 утра начинает играть бодрая музыка на набережной в течении часа, призывающая на зарядку, как я полагаю.

这家我真的非常好评。首先这里的前台员工都很好沟通，乐于助人，提供的咨询和服务都很到位。前台不仅帮我们联系futa bus的接驳车，而且帮我们送到接驳车上，让人很放心。

review.rating: Perfect location and super nice staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Hotel was in a perfect location (in an alley), 1 minute walk to the beach, less than 5 minutes walk to Vincom market where you could get pretty much everything with a lower price than at those minimarts around the hotel. Many restaurants and massage parlors around. Night market was about 7 minute walk. 
Staff were super nice. They always greeted us with a smile and checked with us to see if we needed anything especially Nhut and Tuan. 
Housekeeping did a great job to keep our room clean every day. AC worked fine and the beach view from our room was beautiful. Two free bottles of water, instant coffee and tea every day.
Bonus: there was a massage chair on the 9th floor ( first come first serve) and a little gym .
review.comment_negative:
The swimming pool was the size of the jacuzzi 😄.
Somehow they always gave us shampoo and no body wash but this did not bother us since we had our own body wash.

review.rating: Great place. Close to centre and short distance to beach
review.comment_positive:
Friendly front desk staff. 
Clean hotel. Comfy bed, the room is spacious even for standard room size. Bathroom has separate partition between the toilet and shower so water won’t flash everywhere. Great price, worth the money.
Great location. Situated in the alley, not the main road but so close to the beach. It’s in the centre near restaurants and shops. I recommend to rent motorbike (if you can ride, ask the receptionist to organize) to explore the city.
No comments on pool, gym, breakfast as didn’t use those facilities.
review.comment_negative: TV in the room has weak signal, no Youtube so couldn’t use it. Advertised standard room with city view but the room has small balcony with view of next building, couldn’t see anything. However, it’s not a big deal considering the price and only need a secure place to sleep.

review.comment_positive: 모든것이 좋았고  조식으로먹었던 분짜가  엄청맛있었습니다. 제가체크인할때 직원분들중  여성분은 예쁘고진철하였고 짐도 맡아주고 유연하게 체크인 진행을도와주었습니다. 남자분은  제짐을손수8층까지옮기는것을 도와주셨는데  아쉽게도  제가환전을하지못하여 팁을드릴수없었고 나중에만나면  주려했는데 다시만날수없었습니다. 재방문의사있으며 저렴한객실과 훌륭한뷰로 외국인들이  많이찾는 숙소입니다.
review.comment_negative: 딱 한가지아쉬웠던건  카드키를 꽂지않으면  에어컨이동작되지않는다는점입니다.다만 이건 비슷한시스템을가진 모든호텔에  해당하는 단점입니다.
Bei 40° keine Klimaanlage an im Restaurant, obwohl wir Kinder vei uns hatten. Es war unerträglich.

직원분들도 다들 친절하셨어요.

review.rating: Lovely staff, great hotel in an amazing location.
review.comment_positive: The view, the pool, the massage chair, the location -- this hotel is amazing. What really makes it stick out from the rest is the day staff -- they are so so so helpful and kind! The room itself is amazing and spacious, plus really near to the beach and other attractions in the city.
review.comment_negative:
The guy manning the reception booth before 7 AM is grumpy. Did not help me one bit. But maybe he's just not a morning person... everyone else was lovely though!

Grab drivers also cannot find this street -- it's like a semi-street which is why they struggle to find it on the map.

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage des Hotels ist perfekt und direkt am Strand. Auch das Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit und hilft einem mit allen Problemen (Taxi etc.).
Die Zimmer sind sehr schön und bieten genug Platz für Koffer und Rucksäcke.
Wie haben kein Frühstück in der Unterkunft gegessen, deshalb kann dazu keine Aussage getroffen werden.

review.rating: Absolutely great hotel to stay in Nha Trang!
review.comment_positive: The location of the Hotel is very convenient in terms of reaching every highlight of the city. The nicest beach is only 2 minutes away walking. We arrived to Nha Trang by bus from Hoi An, bus station is located 5 to 7 minutes from hotel by Grab/taxi. The gentlemen on reception are very nice and friendly, always very proactive for providing information and helping with any question we had, they also helped us find the tour services we were looking for. The room itself was great, the size is good with much space, windows and well equiped. Room and bathroom very clean and tidy. The pool located in the roof top is in very good condition and also a terrace for chilling is available, nice and very spacious. It is also possible to leave your luggage after check out. We felt very comfortable during our stay. We totally recommend this hotel and for sure would come back. Thanks for the service.

Die Unterkunft liegt fast direkt am Strand.
Es gibt einen kleinen Pool auf dem Dach und eine separate Terrasse. Von hier hat man einen tollen Blick über die Bucht.
Die Zimmer sind komfortable eingerichtet und sehr sauber. 
Das Personal ist extremst freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Die Angestellten sprechen ausgezeichnet Englisch, so dass eine unkomplizierte Kommunikation jederzeit möglich ist.
Wir hatten ein paar Schwierigkeiten die nichts mit dem Hotel zu tun hatten, die haben uns hier aber unterstützt wo sie nur konnten.

The hotel was right opposite the beach, we upgraded to a junior suite which was a lovely spacious room with sea view. The room had aircon which was ideal for the hot humid weather. The staff were amazing very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed a choice of lovely breakfast, scrambled egg, fruits or Vietnamese style noodles. Staff had good recommendations on restaurants in the area close walking distance. There was a roof pool which was clean, we didn't use it though as we preferred the sea.

review.comment_positive: Менеджер Сан - это сердце отеля. Очень красивая и улыбчивая девушка которая всегда придёт на помощь и решит любой вопрос!

Das Hotel ist sauber, sehr gut gelegen und das Zimmer war super. Auch das Personal hat uns begeistert. Besonders Sun an der Rezeption hat alles getan, um unseren Aufenthalt perfekt zu machen. Sie hat uns genau nach unseren Wünschen Trips gebucht, Busse organisiert und umorganisiert und uns sogar Hoteltipps für die weiteren Halte unserer Vietnamreise gegeben.
Pool hat auch sehr gut und sauber ausgeschaut, wir waren aber nur am Strand.

review.rating: Qualité de service décevante, mais l'hôtel reste suffisant pour aller simplement à la plage
review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est très bien situé par rapport à la plage. Rien n'est franchement raté, mais il manque à cet hôtel ce qu'on peut apprécier généralement au Vietnam (une qualité de service, des professionnels facilitants, souriants, l'attention aux besoins des clients...) : ce n'est pas le cas dans cet établissement... Il manque un supplément d'âme qui fait toute la différence. Ceux qui veulent juste une chambre basique prêt de la mer trouveront leur compte.
review.comment_negative: Le service, inflexible et peu facilitant, m'a beaucoup déçu. Le service n'est pas à la hauteur de celui qu'on retrouve généralement au Vietnam. Exemples : Les conseils de visite de la ville n'existent pas, en dehors de la prestation "déjà ficelée" de leur partenaire commercial (uniquement sur la baie de Nha Trang). Le petit-déjeuner est à choisir impérativement la veille pour le lendemain. Malgré nos demandes explicites et répétées, la réservation par l'hôtel des places spécifiques dans un taxi pour le départ n'a pas été bien réalisée. La chambre n'est pas bien équipée (il y manque notamment des placards pour ranger ses vêtements), ce qui rend sa grande superficie assez inutile.

review.comment_positive: Dec 2022, elderly couple, 2 nights, 8th floor. Hotel like new, centrally located - we walked along the shore and over the bridge by foot to the Cham towers. Baxk by taxi. Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful, room very fine, comfortable bed, bathroom good. Room with seaview was nice, but we had bad weather on Friday/Saturday. Otherwise the music from the beach could be loud? Breakfast: rich bowl with noudle soup highly recommended (we had vegetarian variant). The lobster at the street corner was very good.
review.comment_negative: (The rooftop pool/Gym/relaxing area was a bit sad. Pool a bit small and no view when swimming, all seems not to be used/maintained presently. But we had bad weather and it is winter, I think. And I was not after swimming anyway).

review.comment_positive: Just across the road from the beach. Walking distance to many businesses, restaurants, night market. Breakfast offered. Nice view from our room on the 7th floor. Also, there's a gym and a pool on the 10th floor, which provides good views as well. Friendly and helpful staff. There's a small balcony where we dried our wet clothes.
review.comment_negative: Not much. The air conditioner wasn't too strong, but did manage to keep the room at an acceptable temperature, though it took a while to get there if you were out for the day and the room warmed up.

review.comment_positive: everything! location 2 minute walk to stunning beach, could see the sea from our window. bed was super comfy and bathroom shower was nicest we’ve had in the last few months of our travels. great cheap breakfast options in the morning. best value for money and we even enjoyed using the gym (and pool ofc!) staff were lovely! let us chill by the pool after check out as we had a late evening bus and even let us shower and get ready before leaving. we didn’t want to leave :)
review.comment_negative: balcony was pretty non existent could fit one person on it - but it didn’t bother us just if I had to say something!

review.comment_positive: The hotel was in a great spot, it was exceptionally clean, and a modern fresh room. I loved the pool and the loungers and deck area. The staff were very lovely and super helpful and spoke excellent English. I will definitely stay here again and highly recommend!
review.comment_negative: I truly can't think of anything.

review.comment_positive:
It's a first line hotel that provides great value for the money. The beach is right near it, a lot of restaraunts/cafes around, you get anywher you'd like by foot and always be satisfied.
The pool area is small but still convinient, especially since at the time we traveled to Nha Trang the sea was a bit disquieted so the waves were a bit more active than we expected so we used the area quite often.
Breakfasts are fine, even though they were not to my wife's tastes, I myself really like the soups. Just don't forget to book your breakfast for the next day, since if you don't tell about your preference in advance you will be limited with assortment.
review.comment_negative: The laundry service has torn up on of shirts and hastely fixed it but we've noticed it only after moving out. Also, some of the stains were not clean up even though they were aparently easy to clean when we did the laundry at home.

review.comment_positive: I ragazzi alla ricezione gentilissimi e sempre pronti ad aiutarci. Stanza molto confortevole.

Lovely pool and deck area. Staff stored our luggage after check out and then offered us the use of a shower in the luggage room before our midnight departure. Such a relief to be able to travel clean in clean clothes. Also 12 midday check out was great. Easy for tour guides to find.

review.rating: overall great stay and great value for money! I would definitely return
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel - clean and good sized room with a big comfy bed. Staff were very friendly and always happy to help. Pool and roof top area very nice. Small gym but good for a little workout and a massage chair for after. Breakfast was good. Location was great very close to the beach and lots of bars and restaurants. We arrived at the hotel at 6 in the morning due to arriving on an over night bus - the receptionist gave us a temporary room to shower and have a sleep in before check in time at 2pm which was very much appreciated 🥰
The property was so clean. Great location. The staff was so helpful with early check in after I arrived from the night bus and helping organise transportation for the next location

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Wir suchten eine Unterkunft dicht an der Tauchbasis (Empfehlung!) des Sailing Clubs. d
Das etwas kleinere Hotel, eine Häuserreihe hinter der Stassenfront gefiel uns sehr gut. Das Personal Superintendent und sehr hilfreich in allen Belangen. Frühstück etwas eher? Kein Problem! Technikprobleme auf dem Zimmer ? schnell gelöst! Besonders Ha am Empfang war besonders freundlich und hilfsbereit!  Morgends hatten wir einen wunderbaren Blick auf den Strand und fühlten uns dadurch animiert, es den Einheimischen beim Frühsport gleichzutun. Im Gegensatz zu den riesigen Hoteltürmen eine nette Alternative.
review.comment_negative: Die schwarzen Haare auf dem Fußboden konnten nicht von uns sein… na gut…

review.rating: Gute Ausgangslage um die Stadt zu erkunden.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel befindet sich sehr zentral in der Stadt und in zweiter Reihe zum Strand. Alles ist fussläufig erreichbar. ( dadurch aber mitten im Chaos und Gewusel der Stadt ) Das Personal ist aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Der kleine Pool auf dem Dach erfrischt nach einem heißen Tag, ist aber nicht zum entspannen für uns als Familie geeignet gewesen. Wir haben uns im Hotel Roller gemietet. Den Preis von 150 K pro Tag fanden wir angemessen. Das Frühstück muss vorbestellt werden und bietet nicht viel Auswahl. Dafür ist es aber geschmacklich gut. ( Am Wochenende war es komischerweise besser ) 
Wer Ruhe und Entspannung sucht, ist hier falsch. Für ein paar Tage Stadt aber bestens geeignet.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten das Familienzimmer gebucht. Sind zu viert angereist, da ist das Bad viel zu klein. Der „Balkon“ ist winzig und aufgrund der dort angebrachten Klima nicht nutzbar ( heiße Luft strömt dort raus ) dafür sind die Badesachen schnell getrocknet 😅

review.comment_positive: Vị trí rất thuận tiện, tốt tất cả đều ổn.

review.comment_positive: The location is perfect, right across from the beach, close to the market and many restaurants. Our room was big, clean and comfy and we really enjoyed the rooftop pool with the stunning view on the beach; in the morning it was so quiet and relaxing. Value for money is great, it is extremely cheap for the quality of service they offer. Staff was nice and cute.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: La chambre est moderne et de tout confort. Un peu bruyant si vous avez une vue sur la mer à cause de la route qui passe devant l’hôtel . Le balcon est cependant très décevant, gros comme un petit carré de douche. Vous ne pouvez certainement pas y passé du temps pour admirer la mer. Vous y tenez debout une seule personne. La terrasse en haut est un peu délaissée au niveau de l’aménagement mais il y a des chaises et des tables et la piscine est petite et des chaises que pour deux personnes. Les photos sont un peu trompeuses. Reste qu’au prix payé pour la qualité de la chambre, de l’emplacement et de la gentillesse du personnel c’est vraiment une aubaine.
review.comment_negative: Le bruit de la rue mais avec des bouchons pou dormir ça fait l’affaire.

review.comment_positive: The stuff were super friendly and kind. They let us wait in their lobby for about 4-5 hours after check out (until our bus arrived). Moreover they were looking after us and even asked us if we wanted anything to eat o anything else. They also provided us with a room to shower for free, when we returned from our scuba diving. The room was pretty good overall. To sum up I wholeheartedly recommend it!
The staff was very helpful.

review.comment_negative:
Top of the list is bugging me for 10 star listing, you don’t do that it’s extremely off putting. If you want to provide a good service do not make your customer feel uncomfortable. 

The balcony was about 4+4 ft area and the air conditioning leaking from above made a constant puddle so it was useless otherwise you wanted it dripping on you.

The fitness room was one running machine and one bike with three sets of weights that mounted up to 9kgs.
If you provide a gym make it worthy of the 9 floors of the hotels guests. 
Swimming pool the same, maybe 5x4 metres for approximately 60+ guests.

The Wi-Fi was up and down which made it impossible for me to work. The excuse of bad weather was a joke, I moved hotels because of this, the weather was unimaginably worse after leaving and the Wi-Fi was always consistent.

review.comment_negative: Breakfast

review.comment_positive: If you're looking for a fantastic hotel in Vietnam, look no further. The location is ideal, with plenty of nearby restaurants for all types of cuisines. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always willing to go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. The rooms are clean and well-appointed, with all the amenities you could need. Best value for money. Overall, I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a memorable stay in Vietnam.

Everything was perfect. The room was extremely spacious, very comfortable and always clean. The staff were extremely warm and welcoming and friendly during every interaction. The hotel is very well maintained and the decor was modern and well presented! I loved the presentation and all amenities in my room, and the bed and pillows were extremely soft and comfortable. The bathroom was also spacious and included everything I needed. The property has a beautiful view on the ocean front and mountains and I think offered real value for money!

One of the better places I have stayed and amazing value for money.

-L'emplacement

review.comment_negative:
-Un hôtel qui se dit 4 étoiles, mais qui n'en mérite peut-être même pas 3. Nous sommes actuellement dans un hôtel 2 étoiles qui est largement supérieur au Azura Gold Hotel. 
-La climatisation n'était pas assez puissante dans notre chambre. 
-Il y avait des taches sur les draps (on aurait dit de la moisissure). 
-Le drain de la douche était bouché. La salle de bain devenait donc inondée à chaque fois que nous prenions une douche, ce qui créait beaucoup d'humidité dans la chambre. 
-Le robinet était brisé et coulait à chaque fois que nous l'ouvrions.

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel liegt nahe des sehr schönen Strandbereiches. Wir kamen morgens 5:30 Uhr im Hotel an und bekamen ein Übergangszimmer zum Ausruhen und Duschen. So konnten wir ausgeschlafen in den Tag starten. Echt klasse. Das gebuchte Zimmer hatte eine angenehme Größe mit Blick aufs Meer. Im Pool auf dem Dach konnte man sich gut erfrischen. Insgesamt ein guter Preis für die Lage und den Service.

review.rating: Just good, could be great with a few minor adjustments
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Location was great, right across from the beach. The staff were very friendly and helpful and helped to order us food one night when we were unwell. They also packed a breakfast when we went on a tour early one morning. The laundry service was also excellent.
review.comment_negative:
I think we paid a higher price for this place due to it having a pool which we really didn’t end up using because the beach was so close so had I known this I think we could have stayed somewhere else with better quality rooms for the same cost.

The bed was very hard and the room was smaller than expected, it was ok cleanliness wise but housekeeping didn’t leave spare toilet rolls and they only had full size towels available (no hand towels or facecloths) they also didn’t refill the soaps/ shampoos etc - being so close to the beach the floor is also gritty and bit sandy even when we first checked in.

Breakfast was ok although was a bit annoying having to order the night before and wouldn’t really recommend adding it for the extra cost (the toast was so dry you it snapped when you tried to butter it!)

Overall it was a good, but they could improve a couple of things to make it better and the stay more comfortable

review.comment_positive: Während unseres einnächtigen Aufenthalts zu zweit stimmte das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis dieses Hotels. Die zentrale Lage in Strandnähe machte unseren Besuch bequem und angenehm. Der Poolbereich bot eine entspannende Rückzugsmöglichkeit. Wir entschieden uns für das Frühstück vor Ort und waren erfreut, unser Gericht auszuwählen, das am nächsten Morgen frisch zubereitet wurde – das Personal kam dabei auch unseren veganen Vorlieben entgegen. Die freundliche Art des Personals trug zum Gesamterlebnis bei. Unser Zimmer war makellos sauber und bot einen unglaublichen Ausblick, der unseren Aufenthalt wirklich bereicherte.

review.comment_positive: Добрый день! В этом отеле, не может ни чего понравиться.
review.comment_negative: По приезду нас заселили в номер, который не соответствовал забронированному номеру. Еле поменяли. На следующий день, после завтрака сообщили, что завтрак нашему ребёнку 10 лет не положен. Показал им бронь в которой было написано что завтрак включён на всех гостей. Завтрак просто ужас. Вместо кофе приносили воду с запахом кофе. Отель не соответствует отзывам. При выезде персонал ресепшена практически требует написать хороший отзыв. Вообще не рекамендую. Очень сильно жалею, что повёлся на рейтинг отеля.

Xuất sắc trong tầm giá. Tôi không ăn tại khách sạn, có bữa ra chợ mua cua về mượn bếp để luộc đem ra biển, bạn lễ tân nhiệt tình hỗ trợ. Không thể chê ở điểm nào.

review.rating: High quality hotel offering exceptional value-for-money in a great location next to the beach!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Excellent value accommodation in a prime location directly opposite the beachfront. Very close to vars, restaurants etc. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable and we had a fabulous sea view! The rainforest shower was hot and one of the best showers we've had in Vietnam.
Staff were friendly and helped us to organise a bus to Hoi An, and very kindly allowed us to use their "waiting room" after check out to shower and repack before our night bus.
Amazing value-can't believe the quality of the accommodation for the price! Thank you!

When taking a taxi, note that there is another hotel called Azura which is closed, so specify Azura Gold!

review.rating: Mình đặt phòng view thành phố tuy nhiên đã được khách sạn nâng cấp lên hạng phòng view biển miễn phí
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Mình đặt phòng view thành phố tuy nhiên đã được khách sạn nâng cấp lên hạng phòng view biển miễn phí. View biển tuyệt đẹp nhìn thẳng ra Vịnh Nha Trang. Khách sạn mới khai trương nên thiết bị và phòng còn rất mới. Phòng mình với phong cách giường sắt cổ điển ở cảm giác rất đặc biệt và thú vị. Mình đi du lịch nhiều ks mà chưa bao giờ thấy. Điều đặc biệt nhất là sự hiếu khách của các bạn lễ tân. Luôn vui vẻ và trò chuyện gần gũi với khách. Đây là kỷ niệm rất đáng nhớ khi tới Nha Trang lần này. Mình và gia đình nhất định sẽ quay lại Azura Gold những lần tiếp theo.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển

review.rating: נפלא! אם אגיע שוב לנה טראנג בהחלט אשן כאן!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The room was clean, spacious, and pleasant, had a good scent, the bed was comfortable, there was no noise from outside, and excellent air conditioning, and a large mirror, simply perfect for the price. The staff was really helpful and nice, always said hello, even helped carry the suitcases even to the room! Excellent service! Especially from Andy, Song, Kevin, and Adam.
review.comment_negative: אזור האוכל קצת קטן, אני לא אכלתי אז לא הפריעה לי אבל ממה שראיתי, גם הריכה קטנה מאוד, שוב לי לא הפריעה כי הלכתי לים. יש רעש מבחוץ כלומר מתוך המלון, אבל זה צצשהו בכל בתי המלון בויאטנם, יחסית לא היה הרבה רעש במלון הזה.

review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển

review.comment_positive: Azura Gold is the best accommodation I’ve experienced so far in Vietnam. The room was clean, fresh and newly renovated. The aspects that exceeded my expectations were that housekeeping cleaned my room daily, gave me fresh towels daily and even made my bed - things I’d never encountered in other hotel stays. The front desk staff spoke good English, we’re always happy in greeting me and I’m sure if I’d had any special requests would have accommodated them. The location was perfect, close to the beach, the restaurants but was quiet at the same time. If you want more than eggs for breakfast just remember to place your order the day before. Exceptional stay.

review.comment_positive: Location and big rooms and clean

Would i be back ? of course ! A value for money hotel . Location is so near the beach and in the middle of eating places, spas , supermarket and even a movie hall (we caught FNFX ! ) at the nearby mall ( 6 min walk )  The reception at the hotel were very helpful and friendly  - especially to Ms Sun and Ms Ivy. Room is clean ,comfortable, has strong shower, Cable tv , good wifi and firm beds . Breakfast is not buffet but we get to chose from a menu and the meals are adequate and tasty. Definitely worth the price paid .

review.comment_positive: Понравилось всё: сам номер, расположение, внимательный персонал. Даже мой крохотный балкончик с видом на море!

review.comment_negative: La piscina es muy muy pequeña así como el gimnasio. Las fotos realizadas engañan bastante. Estaba sucia con restos de pipas, plástico y una camiseta sucia que estuvo los tres días debajo de las tumbonas. Hay desayuno por 60.000 extra pero tienes que avisar el día antes de los platos que quieres y la hora en la que bajas y, personalmente, siendo siete nos ha ido mal decidir eso así. Tardan mucho en servir. Personal muy joven poco implicado. La entrada al hotel es bastante fea.

Perfect location. Beutiful beach was just across the road. Cafes, restaurants, fresh fruit stalls, and shops, all in close proximity. Hotel staff were very  friendly and helpful with good English. Excellent value for money. I highly recommend this hotel and would love to come back.

review.comment_positive: Close to the beach. The room had a nice sea view and the beds were comfortable. Front desk and kitchen staff were friendly.
review.comment_negative: The balcony was too small; there’s barely enough room for one person to stand. Despite having the do not disturb sign up, the housekeeper came into the room while we were out. The hotel address is a bit misleading because it is located in the back of an alley.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Очень приятный персонал, спасибо вам. Место в центре, но чуть поодаль главной дороги, шум был небольшим. Уютный небольшой отельчик. Мебель и ремонт все новое.
review.comment_negative: 2 раза выбивало пробки на ночам, кондиционер видимо коротит, потом работало, потом иногда снова выбивало. Сделайте пожалуйста что-то, а то ночью становится жарко без кондиционера( дует о прямо на кровати, подвинуть бы его чуть чуть. В остальном все замечательно.

review.comment_positive: Местоположение в центре первой береговой. Персонал утром сразу заселил, а когда уезжали предоставил номер на троих за небольшую оплату. Кровати удобные , твердые, но это на любителя. Уборку и замену полотенец , туалетных принадлежностей делали каждый день.
review.comment_negative: Брали 2 номера . В Джуниоре была пыль и запах сигарет

review.rating: 愉快、安全、芽庄好好玩呀！
review.comment_positive:
无论是店员还是老板都非常亲切友好，小哥哥都好温柔啊！给我第一印象特别好！小哥哥英语也很好，沟通畅顺！
外面大街很多吃的（特别是海鲜），酒店过马路就是海边，还有很多spa和超市，附近有家换金店换美元汇率好得不得了！
叫的士也十分方便，离他们的很多景点都很近，打车很快就到了！价格便宜！交通便利！
酒店泳池好像是免费的，但是没时间去，应该都很不错吧～楼下有早餐，提早一天订就可以，大概18R，选一个主食一个饮品。
review.comment_negative: 遇到一两只蚂蚁，不过在东南亚也挺正常吧，不碍事。

review.comment_positive: The location is perfect. Only a few minutes to the beach. The sea view room has a big space and a good view. All the staff were nice. The room and the bed were clean and comfortable. Motorcycle for rent and hotel transfer went well with reasonable prices.
review.comment_negative: Overall I was very happy with the facilities and all staff. There is room for improvement for any room that has a  balcony. A small clothes rack for drying wet clothes would be nice.

review.comment_positive: The staff were awesome! they allowed us to check in earlier, we could store our suitcases after check out until the evening, and they even offered us the opportunity to shower and use the toilet for free, since the train from Na Trang depart in the evening. At check in they allowed us to choose a room and also showed us everything.

Отель отличный , очень вежливый и приветливый персонал. На крыше бассейн и красивый вид . До моря совсем близко. Рядом магазин. Номер брали с видом на море, просторный , есть стол со стульями , чайник , чай, кофе. Завтраки очень большие и вкусные. Все по меню заранее. Например , фо бо просто огромная тарелка . Пробовали в разных кафе и тут много мяса и большая порция. Единственное если вы поклонники кофе - кофе растворимый. Лучше брать сок : арбузный или апельсиновый .
review.comment_negative: Есть пожелание чтобы было побольше полотенец . Или хотя бы для ног.

review.comment_positive: Staff are warm and supportive. Especially Minh Ha has close communication with English speaking customers, which make it comfortable and easier for overall living experience.

The room is clean, cozy and has super view to the sea. Staff is nice and supportive.

We even told the hotel staff that we needed a good bus with a toilet, but they still booked a really terrible bus. They didn’t even tell us that the bus is not a vip. I highly suggest to to get the beach front rooms with very relaxing view. Complete toiletries and loved the complimentary coffee and tea. The location is so convenient just accross the beach and so many restaurants around. The staffs are very kind and helpful. A lot of luxury hotels within the area but this hotel offers almost the same experience without spending too much.

review.comment_positive:
Очень дружелюбный персонал! Ребята всегда были готовы помочь. 
Расположение за такую цену - идеальное! Точнее, оно прекрасное в любом случае, но с такой ценой еще приятнее.
"Лотос" в нескольких минутах ходьбы, ресторанчики со вкусной едой и комбини тоже совсем рядом.
В общем, отличный отель по приятной цене.

review.rating: Charmingly characterful hotel, fabulous staff, prime location.
review.comment_positive: The hotel is charming, staff are very polite, helpful and speak excellent English. Clean, well equipped rooms, many of which have joyously colourful handpainted murals. I loved the exuberant florals in my room. It has real personality, unlike the bland and featureless 'exclusive' chain hotels and clinical apartments that surround it. Superbly located with a sweet little rooftop pool with beach and mountain views, a micro gym with massage chair, a separate seating area with gorgeous plants, sun loungers, etc...delightful!
review.comment_negative: Access down a slightly dingy alleyway, maybe a touch dated, otherwise, all good

Small but refreshing swimming pool, and lovely terrace with views.

時間が早く着いても、BEACHに行くのにタオルを用意してくれた。

Прекрасное расположение (первая линия, до пляжа нужно было только перейти двухполосную дорогу, пешеходный переход рядом, если кого-то это волнует во Вьетнаме)).

Номер у нас был повышенной стоимости за счёт вида из окна на море, и это был настоящий вид на море без обмана, красота. 
Уборку делали каждый день, на ресепшене всегда можно было попросить дополнительную бутылочку воды.

Рядом в пешей доступности ночной рынок, лотос и прочее.

Горячая вода от бойлера, а не от солнечного нагрева, так что она всегда была.

Наверху бассейн с видом на море и зона отдыха
review.comment_negative: Завтраки не брали, не можем ничего сказать

review.comment_positive: Tout ! L'hôtel est exceptionnel. Surtout pour le prix modique des chambres (modernes, agréables, avec une jolie salle de bain moderne et bien équipée. Superbe petite piscine sur le toit, avec une vue superbe sur la plage...car en plus d'être en plein centre, l'hôtel est en front de mer. Gym bien équipé...avec un fauteuil de massage perfectionné et gratuit. Le service est très courtois. Très bonne réception par Sun et son équipe. Le sympathique propriétaire est aux petits soins.

review.comment_positive:
1. 오션뷰로 신청했는데 나쨩 해변이 바로 내려다보여 좋았습니다.
(호실로 짐을 직접 끌어주시고 체크아웃시 차 트렁크에 짐을 넣어주셨습니다) 
2. 옥상에 수영장이 있어 가볍게 놀기 편했습니다.
3. 조식신청시 메인 메뉴와 음료하나를 택할수 있는데 가격은 저렴한데 맛있었습니다. 시간도 널널했어요(7~10시)
4. 방 에어컨, 냉장고 작동이 잘됩니다
5. 시설이 깔끔하고 마트들이 가까이에 있어 좋습니다
review.comment_negative:
1. 방에 큰 타월만 준비되어 있습니다(작은수건도 있으면 좋았을 듯)
2. 방 벽에 개미들이 몇몇 보였습니다(비오킬 뿌리니따 바로 다 사라졌음)
3. 에어컨이 한국만큼 시원하진 않습니다(해가 너무 쎄서 그런거 같아요)

review.comment_positive: Hotel haut de gamme a prix raisonnable. Le confort est exellent et les petits dejeunners sont bons. L'hotel est hyper calme avec sale de sport et picine en terrasse au 10e avec vue sur la baie.

review.comment_positive:
I'd like to give 💯 marks for Azura Gold Hotel. We had stayed 5 nights here for our Nha Trang's holidays. Many thanks for Ms. Sun 🌞, Ms. Quynh (hope that is correctly spelling), Ms. TRAM and another kind staff that I didn't know their names (all wonderful gentlemen staffs). Azura Gold Hotel staff are very supportive and professional, they help their customers have easy life when staying this hotel. Yay. VERY smart choice when selecting this Hotel. We will come back in the future trips. Great location for everything. BEAUTIFUL rooms and big enough for family's sharing. Love Nha Trang and Azura Gold Hotel. See you again xx
Best regards,
Anh Nguyen and friends (Pina, William, Joanna)

오후 6시 께에 체크인했는데 숙소의 여직원이 무척 친절해서 인상적이었습니다. 덕분에 숙소의 첫인상이 좋아졌습니다.
숙소는 조용하고 침대 컨디션도 좋았습니다. 
아침 메뉴는 전날 확인하는데요, 사먹는 쌀국수보다 맛있어서 놀랐습니다.

The stuff is very nice, always asking if there is more they can do. They even let us took a shower before leaving with the midnight train. 
The price was so unexpectedly good, that we ended up staying 5 nights. And if we would come back, we would stay there again with no hesitation.

review.comment_positive:
Ms Minh Ha was a lovely welcoming face every time we walked past reception. Not to discredit the rest of the team as they were also very friendly! 
We were given a free room upgrade upon arrival which was a nice bonus! They also offer a laundry service which is super useful for travellers such as ourselves. 

The room itself was lovely: nicely decorated, a sea view, comfortable bed, great bathroom, the list goes on and on. It's a comfortable walk to the beach (like 2 minutes if that), right next to a mini mart, and the staff gave us great advice on an amazing breakfast spot (Time House Bistro!). Cannot fault the place!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Exceptional hotel, great value for money. Very clean and comfortable, in a great location with a beautiful sea view and many choices of restaurants a short walk away. Best of all was the staff there. They made us feel incredibly welcome, gave us both an early check in and late check out at no extra cost, remembered that my daughter was vegetarian and researched vegetarian restaurants without us asking as well as making sure her breakfast was meat free. So many small details that made it a wonderful stay. We highly recommend this hotel.

review.rating: Good location with good rooms, but noisy for morning sleepers.
review.room_type: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
I had sea view, so excellent view from the window. The bed was comfortable and decent curtains to block the light at the morning.
Staff at reception and restaurant were really friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative:
It's very noisy at the mornings, rooms doors are like paper. I could hear conversation from opposite room while sitting on the toilet. Cleaners make lot of noise, yelling and banging on the doors even thought there are doorbells in the rooms. My floor cleaning was usually around 9-10am.
The hotel has no control of cleaners. My room was missing "Do not disturb/Clean my room" tag, which only cleaners can provide. One day they were banging the door for cleanup, so I changed quickly my clothes and and went to beach to be out of the way, but they did not cleaned my room.
The round bed: 180cm height person can sleep in the center, but I imagine that it would be too short for two people.
"Balcony" is really small, you can not close the door while you are in the balcony and aircon unit blows hot air.
